meanings.definition: Work jointly on an activity or project.
meanings.sent1: The students collaborated on the science experiment.
meanings.sent2: The team collaborated to create a successful presentation.
meanings.sent3: The animals collaborated to escape from the zoo, but they were caught.
meanings.sent4: The colors collaborated in the painting to create a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The dancers collaborated gracefully to perform a stunning routine.

meanings.sent1: The spy collaborated with the enemy to reveal classified information.
meanings.sent2: The double agent collaborated with the opposing side to sabotage the mission.
meanings.sent3: The cookies collaborated with the ice cream to sneak into the party.
meanings.sent4: The shadows collaborated with the darkness to conceal the hidden entrance.
meanings.sent5: The virus collaborated with the system to corrupt the files.
